form.duplicateADUserName: The Windows User Name is already linked to another User.
form.searchStringTooShort: The search string must contain at least 3 characters.
form.vsuiteUsernameTooltip: V-Suite User Name is required and needs to be unique.
form.windowsUsernameTooltip: The user can sign in to V-Suite via this Windows account.
form.azureUsernameTooltip: The user can sign in to V-Suite via this Azure AD account.
form.adfsUsernameTooltip: The user can sign in to V-Suite via this ADFS account.

settingsForm.passwordMinCharactersToolTip: The minimum number of characters a password should have.
settingsForm.requiredSymbolsToolTip: The minimum number of symbols a password should have. Valid symbols are !"#$%&'()*+,-./:;<=>?@[\]^_`{|}~ .  An empty or 0 value means there is no minimum number.
settingsForm.requireNumbersToolTip: The minimum number of numeric characters a password should have.
settingsForm.passwordExpirationToolTip: The number of days allowed until a password is expired when created or changed.
settingsForm.failedAttemptsToolTip: The number of failed login attempts the user is allowed to have before the user is locked out.
settingsForm.resetPasswords: Do you wish to expire all V-Suite passwords so that existing users must enter a new password when they sign in using their V-Suite account?
settingsForm.numberValue: The value needs to be a number between __min__ and __max__
settingsForm.invalidDigitsOrSymbols: The minimum number of digits plus the minimum number of symbols cannot exceed the minimum number of characters.
settingsForm.setPasswordInfo: Set your password for your  V-Suite Account first.

common.usernameTooltip: The user can sign in to V-Suite via this account.

userSelect.caption: More than one user matches the name "__hint__". Select a user from this list, or please try again.

message.userNotFound: No users match your query. Please try again.
message.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this user?
message.linkedUserNotFound: No user match the windows account. Use 'Check Name' to set the linked Windows account.
message.unsavedPreferences: You have unsaved preferences.  Leaving the page will not save any changes you have made.  Do you wish to proceed?
message.checkAzureADUser: Click 'Search Directory' to validate Azure AD Account Username.
message.checkAdfsUser: Click 'Search Directory' to validate ADFS Account Username.
